section.name: Validators
section.p: CLI2 provides a mechanism to validate argument values. The Validator interface must be implemented to create an argument validator. This interface has a single method validate(java.util.List values) throws InvalidArgumentException.
CLI2 has some standard validators included. They validate the following:

subsection.name: ClassValidator
subsection.p: The ClassValidator can validate a value using three criteria:

ol.li: the value adheres to the Java Language Specification rules
the class specified by the name is loadable
the class specified by the name can be instantiated
